info.p: The .DOC file format is the older, proprietary document format that was the default for Microsoft Word from version Word 97 through Word 2003.

It is not a format recommended by CLARIN, due to its lack of sustainability-oriented features and its proprietary nature. Within the Microsoft ecosystem, consider using .docx files. Within the WYSIWYG editing universe, consider also using .odt, with free software that supports it (Libre Office).
See also the fileformats wiki information page.
